recipe.title: Pineapple Foster
ingredients: 1 3/4-inch-thick slice fresh pineapple, peeled, cored, cut into chunks
instructions: Melt butter and sugar in heavy medium nonstick skillet over medium heat, stirring constantly. Add rum and nutmeg and stir until very thick and syrupy, about 2 minutes. Add pineapple and stir just to heat through. Spoon pineapple and sauce over ice cream.
